Queries.GetInvoices:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS '#', CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS 'Estado', A."DocNum" AS 'No_Factura', A."CardCode" AS 'Codigo_cliente', A."CardName" AS 'Nombre_cliente', A."DocDate" AS 'Fecha_Documento', A."DocDueDate" AS 'Fecha_vencimiento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS 'Email_Enviado', B.U_BO_Email1 AS 'Correo1', B.U_BO_Email2 AS 'Correo2', B.U_BO_Email3 AS 'Correo3', B.U_BO_Email4 AS 'Correo4', B.U_BO_Email5 AS 'Correo5', A."DocTotal" AS 'Total_documento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS 'DocEntry'
FROM "OINV" A LEFT JOIN "@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '13'
WHERE "DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' AND "U_BO_CRWS" IS NULL %EstadoDocumento% AND "Series" in (%Series%) AND "DocSubType"= '--' ***SN*** ***DocNum***
Queries.GetCreditMemo:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS '#', CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS 'Estado', A."DocNum" AS 'No_Factura', A."CardCode" AS 'Codigo_cliente', A."CardName" AS 'Nombre_cliente', A."DocDate" AS 'Fecha_Documento', A."DocDueDate" AS 'Fecha_vencimiento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS 'Email_Enviado', B.U_BO_Email1 AS 'Correo1', B.U_BO_Email2 AS 'Correo2', B.U_BO_Email3 AS 'Correo3', B.U_BO_Email4 AS 'Correo4', B.U_BO_Email5 AS 'Correo5', A."DocTotal" AS 'Total_documento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS 'DocEntry'
FROM "ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '14' WHERE A."DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' AND "U_BO_CRWS"IN ('_') %EstadoDocumento% AND A."Series" in (%Series%) ***SN*** ***DocNum***
Queries.GetDebitMemo: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS '#', CASE "U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS 'Estado', A."DocNum" AS 'No_Factura', A."CardCode" AS 'Codigo_cliente', A."CardName" AS 'Nombre_cliente', A."DocDate" AS 'Fecha_Documento', A."DocDueDate" AS 'Fecha_vencimiento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS 'Email_Enviado', B.U_BO_Email1 AS 'Correo1', B.U_BO_Email2 AS 'Correo2', B.U_BO_Email3 AS 'Correo3', B.U_BO_Email4 AS 'Correo4', B.U_BO_Email5 AS 'Correo5', A."DocTotal" AS 'Total_documento', CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS 'DocEntry' FROM "OINV" A LEFT JOIN "@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '13' WHERE A."DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."DocSubType"= 'DN' AND "U_BO_CRWS" IS NULL AND A."Series" = '%Series%' ***SN*** ***DocNum***
Queries.GetEmailNotSend:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocNum, T0.ObjType, T1.U_BO_DocEntry, CONCAT(T2.U_BO_PREF,T0.DocNum) AS 'DocPref' FROM %Table% T0 LEFT JOIN [@BOEE] T1 ON T0.DocEntry=T1.U_BO_DocEntry AND T0.ObjType=T1.U_BO_ObjecType LEFT JOIN [@BOSERNUM] T2 ON T0.Series=T2.U_BO_SN AND T2.U_BO_TD = 'FVC' WHERE T0.U_BO_CRWS = '200'
) B
WHERE B.U_BO_DocEntry IS NULL
Queries.GetSeriesNumberInvoice: SELECT "Series" AS 'Series', "SeriesName" 'Nombre', "ObjectCode" FROM NNM1 WHERE "ObjectCode" = '13' AND "DocSubType" = '--'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberCreditMemo: SELECT "Series" AS 'Series', "SeriesName" 'Nombre', "ObjectCode" FROM NNM1 WHERE "ObjectCode" = '14' AND "DocSubType" = '--'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberDebitMemo: SELECT "Series" AS 'Series', "SeriesName" 'Nombre', "ObjectCode" FROM NNM1 WHERE "ObjectCode" = '13' AND "DocSubType" = 'DN'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberActive: select Stuff( (SELECT CAST(',' AS varchar(MAX)) + convert(varchar, Code) from [@BOSERNUM] WHERE U_BO_TD = 'FVC' FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '') as 'SNFV', (SELECT Code FROM [@BOSERNUM] WHERE U_BO_TD = 'NCC') AS 'SNNC', (SELECT Code FROM [@BOSERNUM] WHERE U_BO_TD = 'NDC') AS 'SNND'
Queries.GetTiposOperacion: SELECT "FldValue" AS 'Valor', "Descr" AS 'Descripcion' FROM UFD1 WHERE "TableID" = '@BOEBILLINGP' AND "FieldID" = '14'
Queries.GetCategoryeBilling: SELECT MAX("IntrnalKey") AS 'IntrnalKey' FROM OUQR WHERE "QName" = '%NombreQuery%' AND "QCategory"='%CategoryID%'
Queries.GetIntrnalKeySearchFormatted: SELECT MAX(IntrnalKey) AS IntrnalKey FROM OUQR WHERE QCategory = '%CategoryID%' AND QName = '%NameSearchFormatted%'
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaOK1: SELECT T0."Code", T0."U_desc" FROM "@BPCO_MM_ACECO" T0 ORDER BY T0.Code
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaEXX: SELECT T0."Code", T0."U_desc" FROM "@BPCO_MM_ACECO" T0 ORDER BY T0.Code
Queries.FormattedSearchUnidadesMedidaEstandar: SELECT DISTINCT "SalUnitMsr" AS "Unidad de Medida Estandar" FROM "OITM" ORDER BY 1
Queries.FormattedSearchFacturasdeVenta: SELECT "DocNum" AS 'No. Factura', "DocDate" AS 'Fecha Contabilizacion', "CardCode" AS 'Codigo Cliente', "CardName" AS 'Nombre del Cliente', "DocTotal" AS 'Total Documento' FROM "OINV" ORDER BY 1,2
Queries.FormattedSearchSeriesNumeracion: SELECT "Series", "SeriesName", "InitialNum", "LastNum", "Remark" FROM NNM1 WHERE ObjectCode IN ('13','14')
Queries.GetFormmatedSearchKey: SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL("IndexID",0) FROM CSHS WHERE "FormID" = '%FormID%' AND "ItemID" = '%ItemID%'
Queries.GetDocEntryAndParameters:
SELECT TOP 1 T0."DocEntry", T0."Series", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_L" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "Localizacion", T0."U_BO_CRWS" AS "CRWS", COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_FormE" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP]),0) AS "FormaEnvio", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Password", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_UserDB" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "UserDB", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PassDB" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "PassDB", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaPDF" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDF", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_RutaXML" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "RutaXML", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaCRL" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaCR", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_GXP" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "GeneraXMLP", T1."U_BO_PREF" AS "PrefijoDes"
FROM "%Tabla%" T0 LEFT JOIN "@BOSERNUM" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" WHERE T0."DocNum" = '%sDocNumInvoice%' AND T0."Series" = '%sSerieNumeracion%' AND T0."DocSubType" = '%DocSubType%'
Queries.GetDocEntryAndParametersService:
SELECT TOP 1 T0."DocEntry", T0."DocNum", T0."Series", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_L" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "Localizacion", T0."U_BO_CRWS" AS "CRWS", COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_FormE" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP]),0) AS "FormaEnvio", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Password", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_UserDB" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "UserDB", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PassDB" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "PassDB", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaPDF" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDF", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_RutaXML" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "RutaXML", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaCRL" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaCR", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_GXP" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "GeneraXMLP", T1."U_BO_PREF" AS "PrefijoDes", T0."UserSign" AS "UserSign"
FROM "%Tabla%" T0 LEFT JOIN "@BOSERNUM" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" WHERE T0."DocEntry" = '%sDocEntry%'
Queries.GetParameterstoSend: SELECT TOP 1 "XmlPath" AS 'XmlPath', (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP] WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS 'TokenEmpresa', (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM [@BOEBILLINGP] WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS 'TokenPassword' FROM "OADM"
Queries.GetRPTDoc: SELECT T0."CODE" AS "TipoDoc", T0."DEFLT_REP" AS "ID_Layout", T1."DocName" AS "NombreFormato", (SELECT TOP 1 A.U_BO_RutaCRL FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDFyXML" FROM "RTYP" T0 LEFT JOIN "RDOC" T1 ON T0."DEFLT_REP" ="DocCode" WHERE T0.CODE = '%TypeDoc%'
Queries.GetRPTDocUser: SELECT TOP 1 "DoumntDode" AS "TipoDoc", T0.DfltReport AS "ID_Layout", T1.DocName AS "NombreFormato", (SELECT TOP 1 A.U_BO_RutaCRL FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDFyXML" FROM "RDFL" T0 INNER JOIN "RDOC" T1 ON T0."DfltReport" = T1.DocCode WHERE DoumntDode = '%TypeDoc%' AND T0.UserId = '%UserId%'
Queries.GetCUFEInvoice:
SELECT U_BO_CUFE AS 'CUFE', CASE WHEN "U_BO_Pref" = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(T2."BeginStr",CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(50))) ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" as NVARCHAR(50)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento", FORMAT (T0."DocDate", 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS 'fechaEmision'
FROM OINV T0 LEFT JOIN [@BOSERNUM] T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" LEFT JOIN "NNM1" T2 ON T0."Series"=T2."Series" AND T2."ObjectCode" = '13'
WHERE T0.DocNum = '%DocNum%'
Queries.GetCUFEDebitNote:
SELECT U_BO_CUFE AS 'CUFE',
CASE WHEN "U_BO_Pref" = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(T2."BeginStr",CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(50))) ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(50)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento",
FORMAT (T0."DocDate", 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS 'fechaEmision'
FROM OINV T0 LEFT JOIN [@BOSERNUM] T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" LEFT JOIN "NNM1" T2 ON T0."Series"=T2."Series" AND T2."ObjectCode" = '13'
WHERE T0.DocNum = '%DocNum%' AND T0.Series = T0."DocSubType" = 'DN'
Queries.GetInvoiceandPrefijo: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(T1.BeginStr,CAST(T0.DocNum AS NVARCHAR(20))) AS 'PrefWithDoc', (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "TokenEmpresa", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP") AS "TokenPassword" FROM "OINV" T0 LEFT JOIN "NNM1" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Series" AND T1."ObjectCode" = '13' WHERE T0.DocNum = '%NoDoc%' AND T0.DocSubType != 'DN'
Queries.GetModoandURL: SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN U_BO_Mdo = 'PRU' THEN U_BO_URLWSPRU ELSE U_BO_URLWSPRD END AS 'URLTFHKA', U_BO_Mdo AS 'Modo', (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Password" FROM "@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE %Estado% %DocEntry%
Queries.CFLSN: SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(CardCode,'') FROM OCRD WHERE CardCode = '%CardCode%'
Queries.DecimalQuantity: SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END AS "CantidadDecimales" FROM "OCRN" B WHERE B."CurrCode" = (SELECT "MainCurncy" FROM "OADM")
